website_summaries.verdict: A well-made and easy-to-use rotating flagpole that prevents furling flags. A good value for the money.
pros: Great value flagpole that does what it needs to do
Will take grommet or banner-type flags without issues
Spinning element helps prevent flag from tangling up
cons: Some buyers received only one hook for the flag

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the Flag Unflurred in Lubbock Winds
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy flagpole and mount for the Windy conditions we have in Lubbock Texas. I especially appreciate the way it keeps the flag unfurled in all our Texas wind... This is my 2nd Flagpole like this, The first was in Sunny Southern California where it held up well close to 10 years! Not sure what happened to it during out move last year, but was glad I could purchase another just like it.
customer_reviews.author: William P. Shivers

customer_reviews.title: Let your pride fly
customer_reviews.text: The flag pole is nice. Well packaged for shipment and arrived in good condition. It was hard to put the pole together as tight as it should be. It's very hard to tighten it down because the top part of the pole is made to spin to keep the flag from twisting up. Because I can't get it to tighten down together, the top half of the pole hangs to the right a little more than it should. Aside from that, it's a very nice pole. Well made and my flag looks awesome flying in the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great Pole!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time to purchase this pole. We have one that is mounted to our deck and flies our US flag. It is really great - the flag flies beautifully and doesn't get wrapped around the pole. My husband had a regular flag pole mounted to his shop and his flags were constantly getting wrapped around it. So, he had me order him this spinner pole after he noticed how great the one works on our deck. He's a happy camper now!
customer_reviews.author: Swamp Girl

customer_reviews.title: Bought it again
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the exact same item, also purchased from Amazon about 3 years ago. The upper section spins exactly as it is supposed to and keeps your flag from getting tangled around it. A little disappointed with the longevity of the product, but to be fair it is exposed to the outdoor elements quite a bit of the time. At this price, I suppose replacing the item once every few years isn't terrible.
customer_reviews.author: S. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.text: This flagpole comes with only 1 hook/clip at the top and nothing at the bottom.. Other customers used the "spreader rings" to attach the flag, but that makes no sense to me. The pole is not 1" in diameter it is only 3/4" and will not fit properly in a standard flagpole mount. The overall quality is not impressive. I would not recommend this product and if I weren't so lazy I would return it. Don't waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nealzee

customer_reviews.title: Nice Flag Pole
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for. The only reason I didn't give it five stars was because it didn't come with instructions on how to add a couple of the actual flag holders onto the pole. I finally figured it out but it would have been nice to at least have had a diagram.
customer_reviews.author: SBFOG1

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It's ok so far buy I've only had it about a week and there is already a noticable bend where the two pieces come together.. it still works but not sure for how long... Definitely not as sturdy as I had hoped. ** Edit it's been a few months and we've had quite a few windy days and the pole has held up well... Still has the same slight angle where the two pieces connect but it hasn't gotten any worse. Overall very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: poor quality, no instructions, very time consuming, cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: I had high expectations buying this for my flag pole in front of my garage. You would think this would be easy to use but i ended up spending hours getting this to work. Its made out of cheap plastic and in wind several times the plastic circles kept breaking. I ended up buying "America's Flag Company HW1INOFURL Stop Flag Furling Never-Furl For Use on 1-Inch Flagpoles" and it finally worked. Pro's: good spin design, looks good from afar Neg: no instructions, cheap plastic that breaks, not designed for flags and that holes in them. Very poorly designed low quality. A flagpole shouldnt take hours to get working!
customer_reviews.author: SteveM

customer_reviews.title: Spinner flagpole working really well so far - no flag tangles
customer_reviews.text: I had one spinner that broke after a few months. I bought another that wouldn't spin. So far this one is working great. I didn't want white, but couldn't find a different brand that the ones I had that wasn't white, so bought it anyhow. It's also longer than my other poles, which turns out to be great since I had a bush that the flag would occasionally bump into. So far it's working really well - no tangles. Now I just have to see if it holds up. Hopefully third time's the charm!
customer_reviews.author: birdloverus

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE, DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: OK,I like the mount and the spinning of the pole in the wind. HOWEVER, you cannot mount a flag to this pole! Yep, you buy a flag pole you cant mount a flag to! Ridiculous! They forgot to add the mounting collars to the flag! There is only one attached. So now, because it is a design flaw/mistake, they force you to buy TWO collars as an Add On! These should be part of the FLAG!!! No response from anyone in the company! Go to Home Depot or Lowes, or find another flag pole on here. Don't trust or use this company! One Star is to much for this company. Needs a negative black dot!
customer_reviews.author: verbilkent

customer_reviews.title: Good poles but missing parts.
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased similar poles in the past, so I was confident in making this purchase. I ordered two of these -- both came without the lower flag clip. That is, the clip that secures the bottom of the flag to the pole. They're just missing. I'm sure I can come up with a kludge, but I shouldn't have to. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: LLShopper

customer_reviews.title: Works as adversised and got here quick/
customer_reviews.text: For some reason. my flag likes to blow up on the roof. I changed to an adjustable bracket and it helped, but the flag kept wrapping itself around the pole! This flagpole solved the problem. Occasionally the flag will drape itself on the pole, but for the most part it hangs properly now. The pole seems of good construction with a nice finish. It looks to be about the same as other, higher priced poles. I guess time will tell how well it holds up. Shipping cost was reasonable, and it got to me within a few days -- quicker than I expected!
customer_reviews.author: Trust Me

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE 3 years later -- Satisfied 1st time user of a flagpole
customer_reviews.text: 3 YEAR UPDATE - The pole is still doing it's job. The metal spring that holds the "tab" on your flags rusted, so I just used a safety pin now. MY ADVICE, give the spring attachment some protective spraypaint. Pole is in full sun, Pasadena, California (so no snow, rain, hurricanes, etc.). So if you're new to flagpoles, you need to know there's a difference between banners and flags, and grommets and such. Let's just say I never knew my Snoopy "banner" had a fabric tab inside the top for you to attach to the "spinner flagpole". The winds been blowing and my "banner" is fine!
customer_reviews.author: Le Jambon

customer_reviews.title: Not all it could be
customer_reviews.text: I live on a barrier island in North Carolina where winds are frequently brisk. In the year I've owned this flagpole, it's broken twice. Both times what happened was the portion of the flagpole inserted into its bracket just sheared off, so the pole is getting shorter and shorter. As far as tangling goes, it works OK but there are times where the flag will hang up on it rather than fly freely as it should. It's a common occurrence but not a constant thing... just every now and then. I am not inclined to buy this again. I'm looking for a stronger pole.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Hanig

customer_reviews.title: Just as described. Very durable.
customer_reviews.text: My previous one was outside in all types of Michigan weather for over 7 years. Worked without a flaw until the metal clasp broke after all that time. Well satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken and very cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these and while the shipping was fast, the poles themselves were very cheaply made and poorly packaged. One of the poles was broken on the end by the ball due to them banging around loosely in a large box. Unfortunatly I needed them for an event so I had to hang them even with broken pieces on them to meet deadlines. Therefore not even a refund or anything for them even though I received a substandard damaged product. I wouldnt recommend them to anyone, would say look for a better pole locally or elsewhere online so you will be happy with your purchase unlike me.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Terrific pole
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these for the front of our house. We have an overhang roof that extends out from the garage and our flags would often "hang" on the roof and get twisted around their poles. These have completely solved the twisted flag issue and virtually eliminated the flags from hanging up on the roof. The sleeve spins freely, the truck (brass ball on top of the pole) is attractive, assembly is VERY simple. We had both poles together and flags back up in about 20 minutes. The poles hold 3x 5 flags perfectly, any larger would be too long for the spinning sleeve. Very happy with its performace.
customer_reviews.author: P. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only a year.
customer_reviews.text: My flagpole gets a lot of wind and this one blew itself apart in 12 months. The ball bearings spilled out and the pole bound up. I’ll be looking for a more robust unit.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Bettencourt

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself the regret. Cheap materials.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of the poles for flags and mounting brackets I ordered at the same time. These took longer to arrive and when they showed up they were both broken and unusable. Box was perfectly intact as were the bags the parts were shipped in. Obviously very cheap attachment points because all that was left were tiny pieces in the bottom of the bag. Needless to say I will be ordering better poles now.
customer_reviews.author: jeremiah d moulton

customer_reviews.title: Great design!
customer_reviews.text: For years, we had a standard flag pole. It seemed like our flag was wrapped around it more that it was flying high. I could unwrap the flag, turn, walk back to the front door, and it would be all wrapped up again. This pole is a completely different story. It never gets tangled up. It is well made, and looks great on the house. I was a little skeptical about the plasctic pieces that attach the flag to the pole. They have proven to work like a charm, and have held up through a few very windy days. I highy receommend this product. I bought my flag from Amazon as well.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These poles work well keeping the flags unfurled. At first, I was worried about strong winds coming up, but the poles are sturdy. I have two, and they handle wind gusts up to 40+ mph with no damage.
customer_reviews.author: A. J. Dessler

customer_reviews.title: Base Broken
customer_reviews.text: I liked the pole at first. It was easy to install on my houseboat and operated ok, but I noted its light gage material. Sure enough the pot metal base cracked just by a slight bumping into.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis E. Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my flag tangle free.....mostly
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good product, way better than what I was using before. Does what it is supposed to do for the most part, spin around and keep the flag from wrapping around itself. Everyonce in a while the Flag will wrap itself once, but a quick tug on the flag and its back to working the way it is supposed to. The pole is a bit loose in my bracket, and where the tightening screw in the bracket tightens against the pole the paint has started to come off, but it is barely noticable. I fly my flag 24/7 (I try to take it down if I know a thunderstorm is coming) and after 6 months, I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B

customer_reviews.title: Keeps flags unraveled nicely
customer_reviews.text: Great unit. When the wind blows the flag around the pole, the pole spins and unravels the flag. Also, I like the white pole color better than the bare metal that I had before. The gold finial on the end of the pole is a nice touch, and gives the pole a look of class. I have a 3x5 foot flag on it, but there is an adjustable ring that permits to you install any length flag up to the length of the pole. I like it. Delivery was fast and product was in perfect shape. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick L

customer_reviews.title: Packaging
customer_reviews.text: The flagpole is a great spinner and I don't think the flag will ever get tangled up. The packaging though wasn't good at all...the pole came in two pieces and the two poles side by side in the box rubbed together causing the white paint on the poles to have a good amount of scuffs on them. The gold ball at the top of the pole rubbed so much that there are 3-4 silver spots because the gold paint was rubbed off completely. I called Amazon and they credited me back $5 which was great...but I will need to use that for spray paint to fix the spots on the pole.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good pole
customer_reviews.text: This flagpole is well constructed. I had a pole designed for a 2x3 flag but when I purchased a replacement flag I needed a new pole. I tried this one. This pole is longer than my first but works well and fit in my existing holder. As far as not having a bottom clip for a flag, it comes with nylon fasteners. I used the top clip and one nylon fastener to attach my flag and it works great. The pole did come with some scratches but they are not noticeable unless your sticking your tongue to the pole in winter.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Prevents Flag From Tangling
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several other flagpoles but the ball bearing design of this flagpole really does prevent the flag from becoming tangled. I ordered one and it worked so well that I ordered another. One of my flags developed a few stray threads and they became wedged in the very narrow gap between the ball bearing cage and the pole, causing the pole to bind instead of spinning. I was able to disassemble the cage, remove the threads, reassemble the cage, and now it works perfectly again. The problem was my flag, not the flagpole.
customer_reviews.author: USMC 1803

customer_reviews.title: Good flag pole
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected - no wrapping in wind as before - wish it came in wood color - thanks a lot - I'm adding this section after being congratulated by Amazon that my review was posted - I'm really tired of this review process - I bought a product- period / it came on time and was as ordered / Am I going to have to review the soup I bought at the store next?? Why do I have to review each item I buy on line? Tired of having to come up with something - make it easier!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Doc Eyeback

customer_reviews.title: Take flags down in extreme winds
customer_reviews.text: Had 30knot winds with flag on mount. Tore base screw out, broke one. Flagpole stayed intact. Very slight bend. Unfurled flag, new screws and back up
customer_reviews.author: Danny boy

customer_reviews.title: Let the Flag Wave
customer_reviews.text: This flag pole made our American Flag look like Old Glory once again. It allows The Flag to swing freely around the pole so there is never a twisted wad on the pole. We are very happy with this beautiful pole.
customer_reviews.author: An Honest Review

customer_reviews.title: Don't last as long as the flags on them
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through one of these a year for 6 years. The plastic bearings disintegrate after a year of uv exposure. My flags last longer than the flag pole... Sadly, I can't find anything better...
customer_reviews.author: wyleone

customer_reviews.title: No More Wrapped Flag!
customer_reviews.text: We live in wind tested Kansas and have always fought with our flag wrapping around the pole. I tried about every fix I could think of, but never had any luck. After researching the available options, this spinner flag pole seemed to be the best bet. It's now been 3 windy weeks and our flag has not wrapped once! We are the only house on our block with a flag flying straight and proud. If you have fought this problem as well. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely satisfied with the seller and product I purchased. The flagpoles are better than I expected!
customer_reviews.author: mustang_bruiser

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking pole and good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Assembled and installed this pole yesterday. Nice looking pole and good quality for the price. Only issue was one of the plastic rings used to attach flag to the pole came with the threads on the plastic bolt completely striped and unable to use. I was able to use the metal clip at top of pole and one ring. I will contact seller to try to get replacement. Spinner was put to a wind test immediately and worked great. Just be aware that this product appears to be made in China, it bothered me to hang my American made flag that flew over our Capital on a pole made in China.
customer_reviews.author: RJB

customer_reviews.title: Really works well
customer_reviews.text: I've flown the flag 24/7 for many years so I know about twirling, twisting, furling, tangling flags. This pole has effectively solved those problems. Flag hangs perfectly and hasn't furled around the pole no matter what the wind conditions. UPDATE 9-6-16 I do fly a premium weight, embroidered flag that is only 2' x 3' so this probably helps the flag stay unfurled to some degree but the rotating pole really helps. Here it is two years later and the pole is still working fine.
customer_reviews.author: RICKVOO

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Here again is another example of missing parts..I was again disappointed with my purchase. There was only one , flag holding clip for the flag to not bunch up...had to go purchase a set for an additional $4.. at Valu
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: While it does keep flag somewhat tangle free it does not last very well. The top piece, with the clip for the flag, is made of plastic. After less then one year it fell apart virtually rendering the pole useless. Think if this was made from aluminum or something similar it would have lasted. It literally fell apart and the flag to be blown from the top and hang. Of course at that point it was tangle free so that part held up.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice flagpole !
customer_reviews.text: Very nice flagpole! We were so happy that plastic clips were included with the flagpole when it was delivered . The clips were not mentioned in the product information. I suggest that the add to the description. We especially like the flagpole is a foot longer than most flag poles that are sold on Amazon and at our local stores . ***** STARS from me!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Finally!  A flag pole that works!
customer_reviews.text: It looks sharp too. I have light trim on my house, so the white pole and gold top are very attractive. My flag attached very easily and the pole mounted in my existing holder. The anti wrapping feature actually works! We have wind here in Colorado and I would find my flag either wrapped up or strung up in the gutter frequently. This pole never lets my flag wrap up and a gutter hang is far less frequent (I think because the flag moves freely and does not flip us as much).
customer_reviews.author: Ronald J. Rio

customer_reviews.title: Well made, light weight, functional, looks nice for years
customer_reviews.text: Mine has held up well over the years. For the rare occasion when you are not home to take down flag for a storm, I really like how it helps deflect the wind by spinning the flag and not ripping the flag holder from attachment point. Flags are easier to replace than the side of your house.
customer_reviews.author: MitzyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this a couple weeks ago and it arrived quickly. Just got it up and it's unbelievable. We happened to have a rain storm last night with high winds and rain and not once did my flag wrap itself around the pole. I watched it keep twisting and turning where it comes together and it did it's job. HORRAYYYY!! I'll recommend this flag pole to all my friends who are looking a pole that you don't have to keep untwisting the flag. :)
customer_reviews.author: DMF

customer_reviews.title: Split and bent in 1 month
customer_reviews.text: This flag pole is a great concept but the material is super cheap and it split and bent in half after only a few weeks. It did keep the flag unraveled but the material is not even aluminum, it is aluminum looking. Seller issues partial refund but you pay shipping and return costs so it is NOT even worth returning. SAVE YOUR MONEY. Spending my money wisely on a much better made in America by American Flag Company.
customer_reviews.author: LobstahLovah

customer_reviews.title: Very good flag pole
customer_reviews.text: Very nice flag pole, this is my second. First one lasted through several flags and many rain, wind, and snow storms - finally done in by a tree falling on it. The swivel feature works great to prevent tangles, especially with the swivel rings that the flag clips onto. But a spare set or two of the ring/clips as they will only last about a year.
customer_reviews.author: JimH

customer_reviews.title: Work great and look good
customer_reviews.text: I liked the pole I ordered two and the work great.
customer_reviews.author: John A Luhrs

customer_reviews.title: Stop searching!
customer_reviews.text: GET THE DAMN POLE!! Other than having plastic spinner grommets, it’s fantastic!! Even with the “cheap” grommets, this pole is a beast! It never tangles!! Stands up against lots of wind! ‘Mercia!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie P. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love these. I reordered them due to the old ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I reordered them due to the old ones being ripped off the house in a crazy wind storm that blew down 3 trees in the yard. I love they keep the flags hanging instead of wrapping up on the pole.
customer_reviews.author: KG.

customer_reviews.title: It is fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: This spinner flagpole is just what the doctor ordered. It is fantastic!!! A week after putting it up on the fascia board on my garage we had a big 50 mile an hour wind and rain storm. The flag just went round and round - perfect. No more having to take a long pole and unwrap it the flag from the pole. This spinner flagpole is fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chief Schmooie

customer_reviews.title: Spinning flag pole, house mount.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one, as I wanted one for my college flag (Michigan), to go with my USA flag. It's easier than changing flags between one flag pole. Works great, no more tangles. We're in a fairly windy spot, but no problems with strength, etc.. Also received it a few days before expected...
customer_reviews.author: William Horton

customer_reviews.title: MAKES YOUR HEAD SPIN
customer_reviews.text: This flagpole is exactly as described. My flag never gets wrapped or tangled around the pole. Two spinners (top & bottom) allow the flag to fly freely and as the breeze or wind changes direction the flag goes right along with it. I use it upright for the American flag and than lower it a liitle above horizontal and hang seasonal flags (banners) .Works great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Upson

customer_reviews.title: Study, well built.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pole, but really only works perfectly with a 3x5 flag. I have a 4x6 American flag, and only the top 3 feet spins. That makes my particular flag bunch up at the bottom. However, that's not really the fault of the flag pole, hence the 4 star rating. That being said: it would be nice to have the option of different size flags.
customer_reviews.author: J Dogg

customer_reviews.title: Spinner flag pole.
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with my purchase, but it's certainly not the same quality as my last pole set. It does spin, which eliminates the flag getting tangled in the wind... I just wish it were made with a heavier material. Hopefully, it will prove to be durable and last a few years without getting bent on very windy days. We have a solar light on our flag, so it remains mounted 24/7.
customer_reviews.author: Meema of Eight

customer_reviews.title: Spinner flagpole
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was not entirely satisfied with my flagpole purchase. The flagpoles themselves are excellent and of high quality. But I thought that the installation directions were inadaquate so that when I went to fly my flags, the spinning mechanisms seemed to be flawed. When I phoned customer service, they couldn't have been more helpful and courteous. I hadn't put it together properly in the first place, so that caused the complications. I now have a beautiful product. My flags fly proudly!
customer_reviews.author: steveaylard

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Am very pleased! Before I bought the I was unwrapping my flag from it's pole every day. When I received this it assembled easily, the instructions were easy to follow and within minutes I had it up. Yes once and a while the flag still gets tangled, mostly when wet,but 9 out of 10 times it untangles itself. Looks great, pole is sturdy the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Lovato

customer_reviews.title: No idea how it stays together.
customer_reviews.text: Love the sleek look of the pole, but I can't figure out how the two pieces of the pole stay together. There were no instructions in the package. I tried screwing them together, but that doesn't work. I'm afraid to put the pole outside because a strong wind will come and easily knock it in two pieces. If anyone could help me with my problem, that would be wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: RJ Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome flag pole. It's well made and I love the spinning aspect of it and no longer have to deal with unwrapping my flag on a windy day. I actually purchased a couple more to go along with flags I bought others for Christmas. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Spinning Flag Pole
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this flag pole system with spinning flag connectors because my previous flag was constantly getting wrapped around my previous pole. I placed the new pole in the same location. In spite of experiencing a great number of high winds days this past month my flag has never wrapped around the pole. I am very pleased with this system and feel it was a good value. Furthermore, as this flag now hangs free it is not being subjected to the wear that my earlier flag was experiencing by constantly rubbing against hard surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: American Patriot

customer_reviews.title: Looks good after many years of use
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased several wooden flag poles for decorative flags. They always looked bad after about a year outside in the elements. This metal pole has been out by my front door for many years and still looks good.
customer_reviews.author: GMC

customer_reviews.title: not a great item
customer_reviews.text: not a 1in as described fits loose in holder if i had not used it i would have returned it very dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: billy o

customer_reviews.title: White Aluminum Spinner Flagpole
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one and this is a good product, I live in south Texas where average daily wind is 25 mph with gusts way higher. The spinner ring is a waste of time as the sun's uv rays eat it up in unnder two months. Use black UV proof zip ties and they will last longer than the flag.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: missing parts
customer_reviews.text: got the flagpole and discovered the lower clip was missing. I just happened to have a spare from another flagpole, so I give this only 3 stars, because of the missing clip.
customer_reviews.author: Tx Casscyn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Flag Pole
customer_reviews.text: I have been in search of a flag pole that would stand up to every day flying 24x7. This is such a flag pole. It never furls (wraps around the pole.) As with most, the paint does tend to chip off the bottom of the pole where is rests in the holder, but other than that, this has been a GREAT pole, and I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lindstrom

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a 6ft pole that works
customer_reviews.text: I have several 3 x 5 ft flags. Most vendors have only the 5 foot flag poles which work well with banners but not with the 3x5 flags. This 6 foot spinner pole is exactly what I was looking for. The spinner keeps the flag from twisting around the pole (most of the time). The clamps with 'bolts' make it incredibly easy to change flags and adjust the mounting as needed.
customer_reviews.author: K. Charlton

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: We have only had it up for a day, but so far, this is great. No tangled or wrapped flag with the spinner feature. This appears to be a superior design to our other flag pole which was very expensive and has a ball bearing built into the wall mount.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Trouble free!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I always had to untangle the flags in my yard after a few good winds. Now they do not wrap up on themselves!
customer_reviews.author: L. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good, Works Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Constructed OK, looks good. I put a coat of car wax all over it to help protect from rusting. However, my flag still gets stuck in the rain gutter; doesn't always spin the way it should. Don't loose the cheaply made plastic clips that attach the flag to the pole or you're screwed...
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Meat

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I just got it and put it up. I love it, It works great, and solved the problem of that cheap brown ring thing that looks like it will spin but never does (the one that came with our original one.) This is the answer to your prayers! It took a second to put up and I threw the old wooden one out with the garbage TONIGHT!
customer_reviews.author: etstow

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The flag pole works really well. The flag very seldom gets wrapped around the pole like it did on the other pole I had. We have 2 flags so we purchased another one of these for our other flag
customer_reviews.author: Paul T. Singleton

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't spin
customer_reviews.text: Hooked it up, the flag still wraps around the pole. I did not get the same pieces it showed in the instructions, so maybe it was wrong. but its not spinnning.
customer_reviews.author: PaulStLMO

customer_reviews.title: Does a better job than our previous flag pole and at a ...
customer_reviews.text: Does a better job than our previous flag pole and at a pretty reasonable price. Generally keeps the flag from getting wrapped up on windy days, but on occasion it still needs to be untangled.
customer_reviews.author: Red Stripe

customer_reviews.title: Classy flag pole
customer_reviews.text: My old cheap brass pole gave up after several years of service to my flag with a broken plastic eagle and general fatique. It didn't have the anti twirl feature of this nice pole and not the finish and fine brass top that this one does. I think it is a good buy and would recommend it to others who have a need for a new flag pole.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas N. GilmoreTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: What good is a flag pole with only 1 attachment for a flag???
customer_reviews.text: I was shipped a previously opened item. Half of the pole was out of the packaging, and the middle ring/ clip whole attachment piece is missing. The twist at the top of the bag was also frayed apart, and the bottom of the bag was actually opened already. It looks like someone went part shopping on this product and sent me something I cannot even hang a flag with because there is only 1 CLIP/HOOK/RING whatever. Very frustrating. I hope the seller will make right by sending an actual new fully packaged fully equipped and all parts included item.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Much better than wooden flagpoles
customer_reviews.text: much better than the wooded flagpole we had previously, and this comes with the bottom spinner ring which is absolutely critical. Tip - make sure you tighten the bottom ring, don't let it just run up and down the flagpole.
customer_reviews.author: Fitz

customer_reviews.title: GREAT POLE
customer_reviews.text: Super pole! Keeps the flag from tangling up and wrapping itself around the pole. Very pleased. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Fletcher Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, but not in a good way.
customer_reviews.text: This pole was broken before it even came out of the package. It's painted plastic and the clip broke off during transport. Didn't even get a chance to try it out at all. Waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: P. Clayton

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice looking pole and so far it has held up great. I have not had a very heavy tornado-like wind since I received this but so far it has not tangled and it was easy to put together and looks great. I was very pleased with the product and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Frotzie

customer_reviews.title: Great flagpole
customer_reviews.text: I needed a flagpole for Memorial Day and I am so glad I ordered this one. We use a BIG flag and this pole worked out great, no bending and the plastic grommet rings worked out fine. Only thing is the gold plastic ball was rather cheap but it looks fine from a distance. For the price, it is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: River Runner13

customer_reviews.title: Best yet!
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a couple other spinner flagpoles which have stopped spinning after a matter of weeks. This puppy just goes on and on. Very smooth action, flag never gets fouled up on the pole, well made and looks nice against the side of the house. They say it works and I have yet to see that it doesn't!
customer_reviews.author: Bergsteiger

customer_reviews.title: The Best Products I didn't know I Needed!
customer_reviews.text: This pole is awesome. I used to have to go out every morning and unwrap my flag! Now, I don't! So nice just to look outside and actually see my flag blowing in the wind! If you have flags this product is a must.
customer_reviews.author: FABS

customer_reviews.title: White Aluminum Spinner Flagpole
customer_reviews.text: Good product good price good seller prompt shipment. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: rowlpar

customer_reviews.title: but certainly not good. The gold ball at the top has faded ...
customer_reviews.text: This flagpole is not awful, but certainly not good. The gold ball at the top has faded into a dull lackluster top. I've had it through six months roughly. Also the antifurling only works if you have a screw-in flag pole holder.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: 2nd one purchased
customer_reviews.text: High Quality. I purchased on of these approx. 5 years ago for a business. It has been used outside 5 days a week. And still in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Dan K

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works well for the price, but will not stand up to strong winds on the coast. The nylon ring attachments broke (I was able to replace them with metal washers I drilled to accept the clips), and one pole bent. I would pay more for a stronger pole.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Llewellyn

customer_reviews.title: Had to buy extra parts
customer_reviews.text: This is a good pole and it looks nice. But they should include all the parts you need to put a flag on it. I had to purchase extra parts to put my flag on it hence the 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great flagpole
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, well made 1 inch flag pole. Has 2 plastic capped screws that hold the flag securely. I take my flag in at night and inclement weather and lost one in the bushes but found a replacement screw to use, metric. The flagpole outlasted my bracket. I expect many years of use.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: ... of these and it was honestly some of the best $40 ever spent
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical but I bought two of these and it was honestly some of the best $40 ever spent. I love this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin M McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Used for 2 months. Flag has not gotten hung up, as the top section rotates freely. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A.

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy again
customer_reviews.text: While not made in the USA, this is a great flag pole. It has been up for over a week and has not yet bunched up or gotten tangled upon itself like other flagpoles I've used. I'd prefer it to not have gold at the end of it, but for the price w/ free shipping I'll take what I can get.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a flag pole that holds my 3X5 flag. Albiet the flag is a bit bigger than what this pole is supposed to hold, but it works great, none the less. I had to use a stop at the bottom (because my flag is too big) with another loose clamp, then tie wrap that in place. It has not failed me once (wrapped up) for 3 whole months!
customer_reviews.author: Ody

customer_reviews.title: broken platic piece out of box.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be as advertised, but I knocked it down to 3 stars because the plastic piece holding the little clip under the gold top arrived broken, so this clip is now not attached. However, I am not sure what this clip does or why I need it so I doubt I will go through the process of returning.
customer_reviews.author: JOSEPH MARR

customer_reviews.title: Solid Spinner
customer_reviews.text: I love this flagpole (at least as much as one can love such things). The pieces I got match the description, assembly was easy, and the flag keeps itself untangled in the breeze. The pole is a foot longer than I wanted, but the aluminum is super sturdy and I've survived a couple of 40 mph windstorms. My only complaint is the gold end-cap (I prefer white or silver), but that's easily solved with a can of spray paint.
customer_reviews.author: Seal Beach Software

customer_reviews.title: Residential flag flyer/hobbyest for years
customer_reviews.text: These spinners do the trick, keeping banners/flags untangled.. The white coating does however chip easily,as they are locked in the holder at the base. . I display a minimum of 8 large banners around my house at any given time. I have replaced all my wood poles for these...
customer_reviews.author: Jazzman

customer_reviews.title: Have not untangled flag since receiving pole
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice flag pole for a 3' by 5' flag. It has been out on some very windy day and has not broke or fouled since installed. I was worried about the plastic screw joint breaking but has held up well. I will update if something changes, but so far I'm loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond T. Driscoll

customer_reviews.title: No More Tangling!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit hesitant in buying this flag pole...but I'm glad I did!!! My flags are now flying without any more tangling. I don't have to go outside to untangle them any more. No regrets with this purchase; the timing was great because it came on time before the holiday. I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: cf

customer_reviews.title: Spinner Flagpole
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these flagpoles because we fly the American Flag and the Texas Flag on our house. These poles work really well to keep the flags from wrapping around the pole. I fly these flags round the clock so have a light for nighttime.
customer_reviews.author: granel

customer_reviews.title: would not recommend, the flag hook you see in the picture ...
customer_reviews.text: would not recommend, the flag hook you see in the picture was broken off the pole and twist tied to the pole
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: A perfect flag holder!
customer_reviews.text: It works great. My flag flys freely, never getting tangled.
customer_reviews.author: Richard E. Merrill

customer_reviews.title: Broken when I received it.
customer_reviews.text: The plastic piece that spins and holds the clip that attaches to the top of the flag was broken when I received it. It is no more than 1/8" thick so probably would not have lasted very long anyway. As previously reported there is no place to attach the bottom of the flag. Since being so close to Memorial Day I will use it anyway. If you buy this product also get a set of "1" rotating flag mounting rings". They seem to work great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Miller

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Mounted with 3 x 5 U.STILL. flag on front porch. Had a lot of wind yesterday and our flag never got tangled as it did before. Looks great too.
customer_reviews.author: B. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, well made
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for our new flags we also purchase. They look very nice and seem to hold up well. Assumed they came with the wall holders but they did not (weren't advertised that they did so my fault). Haven't truly tested them in strong wind. They will be out 24/7 so we'll see how well they hold up but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: bahvah

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a no tangle flag pole
customer_reviews.text: I have had several flag poles but all have allowed the flag to twist into a tangle and I wind up having to untangle the flag by hand. Not this one. it has gone through high winds with gusts up to 40 mph and the flag has not tangled once. I highly recommed this flag pole.
customer_reviews.author: MAS

product_meta.title: Online Stores White Aluminum Spinner Flagpole, 6-Feet
product_meta.description: This attractive 6ft two-piece white aluminum flag pole has a ball bearing mounted joint. the top section spins while the bottom part is static. this prevents the flag from "furling", that is getting tangled around the pole. it is fitted with 2" gold ornament. the flagpole comes with 2 clear plastic ez mount clips, which can be used on either grommet or banner type flags.
feature_bullets: Can be used with grommets or banner flags

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars484 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
